about_the_game:
Get ready to race and hide with your friends in the ultimate party game, Acceleration: Supercharged! This exciting multiplayer game is the perfect addition to any game night or get-together with friends.

This thrilling multiplayer game puts you in the driver's seat of a toy car and compete against your friends in gamemodes like Hide n Seek, Tag, and Freeze. You'll join one of two teams, cops or robbers. The cops must use their skills and abilities to find and tag all of the robbers before time runs out, while the robbers must use their skills, and unique abilities to evade capture and survive until the timer runs out.

Choose your favorite toy car and race against friends on challenging tracks filled with obstacles, jumps, and tight turns. Outmaneuver opponents to cross the finish line first. With multiple tracks and gameplay modes, the racing action is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Whether you're playing with a small group of friends or a big party, Acceleration: Supercharged is the perfect game for an exciting and entertaining night. With fast-paced action, thrilling gameplay, and colorful graphics, you and your friends will have a blast racing and hiding in this fun party game. So grab your controllers, buckle up, and get ready for an unforgettable game night!

name: Celeritas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8,10
  • Processor: intel i3 7th gen
  • Graphics: gtx750m
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8,10
  • Processor: intel i7 8th gen
  • Graphics: Gtx 1050ti
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Get ready to race and hide with your friends in the ultimate party game, Acceleration: Supercharged! This exciting multiplayer game is the perfect addition to any game night or get-together with friends.
